title: Nobody in this world can tell me Lulu, Janna, Soraka, kog, twitch and Tristana are balanced
body:
It would be so delusional. 

Those champions are pure cancer to play against, every other champion would have been murdered with nerfs if they would have Janna’s stats. 

Maybe the reason is Meddler mains Janna or support in general idc. Would also explain why he doesn’t allow proper nerfs to fucking twitch and Tristana. Kog is as ridiculous and retard balance team doesn’t see it

replies.body: welll they are kinda balanced. items arent.
Lulu, Janna, Soraka, Kog, Twitch and Tristana are balanced
Wait, you can access the internet in space?
of course he can where do you think the satellite is
No, he's accessing it from the future. In the year 2050 when riot finally realizes it's not fun to be in an adc centred meta.
That would still be in this world though and the OP said that no one in this world could do that

It's not this world actually, because the future is a series of parallel possibilities for our world based upon chance meaning that his present may or may not be our future, and in fact is likely not concidering riots balance trend.

However, his past must be our present and therefore he knows what happens and can make the statement that these champions are balanced.
In that case I graciously cede victory to your superior grasp of logic (which isn't allowed here) and convoluted arguments (which are).
Funny thing is , that twitch still isnt nerfed.
Lulu, Janna, and Soraka are balanced, ardent censor and coin need to be looked at.

Ofc they are balanced that's why they always sooner or later become broken opressive. 
All because they are so super balanced and the best designs in the game.
Sounds like your problem isn't with the champions you're playing against, but rather in farming up in opposition to them.  Every champion feels OP when you're behind.
From champs you mentioned, Kog isn't really too strong by himself, it's censer and enchanters that make him BS. His winrate isn't impressive at all unless he is played with a support like that.

Play Kog without a team comp based on defending you and see how that goes. Tristana was dumpster tier months ago and she got no buffs, it's just the meta. Twitch was designed to have a bad lane but all bullies were nerfed.

If you're incapable of removing Kog'Maw from the picture, than you don't deserve to win the game. Immobile, item reliant, TEAM RELIANT, and CD reliant. There are a number of things to gate him, yet you can't work around ANY of them to win the game. You simply don't deserve to win.

In my obviously unbiased opinion, Soraka is perfectly fine.

{{sticker:sg-soraka}}
sorakas not busted.

I can't give you anything for the supports, don't play them. Can't say I find Soraka that OP though, since Executioner's exists.

Twitch, I will give you.

Kog'Maw is strong because of the meta. You tone done peel and shields. he'll go back to being easy to kill. He's supposed to deal a crap ton of damage, off-set by the fact that he had no mobility and his kit generally wants him to stand still.

Trist isn't particularly strong on her own right now, just she's safe and has an even damage profile, which makes her reliable. Again, tone down peel comps, and bring back lane bullies, and she'll fall back down, just like before all the Cait nerfs (as far as I aware, Trist received no changes this entire time, either nerfs or buffs)

Correct. Trist was dumpster just before the meta kicked in, she has received no buffs in a very long time, it's literally just that she does a lot of damage and items are cheaper so she can reach hyper carry status faster.

Triatana was perfectly finw if not weak up until Caitlyn nerfs and ardent and enchanters becoming popular..her last change was 7.2 (unless ive missed aomething recent, I havent been in the game the past couple weeks) and all that was a duration buff to q by like 3-4 seconds i believe.

Here is the website I use to look at patch history.   https://lol.gamepedia.com/Tristana_-_The_Yordle_Gunner  And I guess it was 7.3 not 7.2

Edit: I guess her e got some changes 7.18 

Edit 2:forgot to mention ad items are strong too which helps

Lulu, Janna, Soraka, kog, twitch and Tristana are balanced. there I said it, now you are a liar.
They are balanced relative to eachother.

None of those champions are to strong. (Okay well twitch is - his playstyle just isnt healthy for his itemization)
Their items are to strong and enchanters are strong when marksman are strong by their very nature. 

You want hypercaries to be less powerful? nerf the items. Because _Marksman scale with their items, of which they have the cheapest set of completed items in the game_.

> You want hypercaries to be less powerful? nerf the items. Because Marksman scale with their items, of which they have the cheapest set of completed items in the game.

Moreso bring back lane bullies. Hypercarries are supposed to become super strong late game, and the goal of lane bullies (like Cait, and a bit Ashe) is to delay that late game as much as possible

But when a standard marksman reaches "late game" with {{item:3031}} {{item:3085}} {{item:3006}} {{item:1053}} its _really_ hard for lane bullies to actually bully. 
Even more so when harass simply doesnt stick due to the sheer prevalence of sustain for AD champions.

First off, just so you know, didn't downvote you.

Second: that's just false, and you either think that because you don't play the role, or just say it on purpose to contribute to the hate-jerk. No ADC is doing any kind of meaningful damage with just those items, or are they sustaining through actual burst damage.

Bring back lane bullies (including lane bully supports), and tone down peel comps, and hypercarry ADCs will have a much harder time in the meta

What? Did you miss the several games last night where the commentators were saying "x adc is in the late game now" when they have IE/zeal item/boots? 
It doesnt change the fact that marksman hit their powerspikes much earlier than other classes, have much stronger spikes than other classes, and they have a LOT of sustain options in the form of masteries. 
You have what.... 2%+5%+3% (from dorans) at level ONE.  At level 18 that goes up to 2+40+3. Its absolutely massive and it makes lane bullies highly innefectual because unless they hurt a LOT and have nigh infinite mana youre just not going to hurt them enough to have it stick.

2 things
1. Nobody uses lifesteal quints which i assume is where your 5% value comes in. Early game trades/all ins are won by attack speed quints so everyone has them.
2. Nobody uses the 2% lifesteal mastery for the same reason above. Don't believe me go look at what the pros use.
Getting real tired of people acting like adc's start with a bloodthirster just for loading into the game.

Edit: also where the hell do you get 40% from are you talking about warlords bloodlust??? something that only triggers every 5 (lategame with rfc) or 7-8 (early game auto attacks) I guarantee you warlords is incredibly negligible sustain and only after 3 waves or more would an adc heal 200 hp in the early game

Hah. the middle number is warlords, and its not negligible. Unless youre being CONSTANTLY peppered with basic attacks you WILL heal up, and if they have a shield/heal support youre even less likely to have damage stick. 
Who takes natural talent? Its what, 10AP and 15AD at level 18? 

You talk like 5% lifesteal isnt a lot - over time, especially in the lane phase, it adds up to a LOT. 
Further, you get two procs of warlords every wave if youre moving properly. Assuming one basic per minion... 
10+5+5+5+5+10

Thats 40% total over a wave. Thats a LOT of healing.
Cait is going to be tooled as a hyper-carry now.

from personal experience janna just gets fucked without a advantage in lane, rushing ardent censor is crucial on util supports, but you need way more key items(athenes,sightstone,support item,etc) and even if you get the gold to buy it, how are YOU going to survive? how are YOU going to have enough survivability to shield everything? sure you have ulti, but you have to stand there as well and just like trist, even if you can knock them back, gap closers and ccs could just as well fuck you.

Soraka is balanced because you can shut her down with grievous wound.

Soraka is balanced but people refuse to buy a single that that nerfs her into the ground. I have never had a problem with Lulu support. Now Machine Gun lulu was fun.  For Lulu support she easily shows when she is going to Q by the way they play. Janna isn't that bad to tell the truth. Unless she builds FULL AP her shields don't really give that big of a shield it's the items that are broken on her not the champion. Her shield at max is 240(70% AP) not building ap she has a shield that takes maybe 2 auto attacks without crits.

Now Kog has one of the lowest base HP of any ADC outside of ezreal and Kalista and Vayne. You can easily poke him down since most of his skills are skill shots outside of his W.

I will give you Twitch and Trist. Both champions can just murder anyone in a blink with a couple of items.  Especially twitch his invisibility and then spray and pray is just murder. While Trist can just destroy towers from out of range of tower shots.

They always count the amount of $$ they can generate just by keeping those champions godtier. 
Assume you've nerfed these champions, what would happen is a massive shift in champion select, which means massive shift in counter-picks, and that's not part of their plan.
